{{infobox character | image= | caption= | people=[[Avari|Avar]] ([[Nelyar|Nelya]]) | name=Enelyë | pronun=[[Quenya|Q]], {{IPA|[ˈeneʎe]}} | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Cuiviénen]] | affiliation=[[Nelyar]] | language=[[Proto-Quendian]] | birth=Awoke in {{YT|1050}} | birthlocation=[[Cuiviénen]] | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor=Being one of the first [[Elves]] to awake | house= | parentage=None (one of the [[Eru-begotten]]) | siblings= | spouse=[[Enel]] | children=Several | gender=Female | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Enelyë''' was the third spouse to the [[Elf-fathers]] to be [[Awakening of the Elves|awakened]].
